English: Liberated, Accomplished, The Adept's Pose – seated cross-legged with knees down

Variation: Butterfly legs, buttterfly legs and arms, reverse corpse (lying on the front)

English: Wind Release Pose – supine with knees to chest
Half Wind Release Pose – supine with one knee to chest
Belly twist – lie on back and windscreen wiper the legs over to one side
Crocodile – supine with elbows down and supporting head in hands
Cat / Cow – on all fours arch back upwards then downwards
Variation: Reverse hands, side bend look backwards on cow

English: Mountain – standing with hands by sides
Prayer pose – standing with hands in prayer

Variation: Prayer hands, revolving, hands clasped behind back, holding opposite elbows, holding calves

English: Dolphin – down face dog with forearms down

Variation: Lift one foot from the floor

English: Lord of the Dance, Nataraja's Pose

Variation: Leg to the side, leg to the front
One hand, one hand one foot

English: Formidable – side plank with front leg behind head
Bharadvaja's twist – kneeling to one side with upper body twist
Lion – wide kneel, reversed hands and tongue out
Cowherd, Gorakhnath's pose – seated with knees spread and soles of feet pressed together
Embryo in Womb – lotus holding face
Hanuman's Pose – front splits with arms pointing upwards
Baby crow – forearms on the floor, knees to biceps
Supported back bend with shoulders down and legs upwards
Locust – prone backbend with legs elevated and straight arms pushing forward
Snake – prone backbend with legs elevated and straight arms pushing backwards
Head to knee – seated forward fold
Heron – seated with one foot back like hero and lift straight leg to head
Fish – supine backbend with hands under glutes and back of head on floor
Plough – shoulder stand with legs straight over head
Shooting bow, Archer, Bow and arrow
Marichi's Pose – seated one leg straight with upper body twist
Lord of the Fishes, Matsyendra's pose – loose cow face with upper body twist
Open Angle – seated straddle forward fold
Tortoise – straddle forward fold with arms under legs
Yogic sleep, Noose Mudra – both legs behind head
Ananta's pose, Vishnu's Couch pose – straight leg lift lying on the side
Frog – prone backbend holding top of one foot
Frog – prone backbend holding top of feet
